Enumeration.Name: Ein_bei_Dimmwert____min._Dimmwert
Enumeration.Text: On if dimming value >= min. dimming value

Enumeration.Name: Aus_bei_Dimmwert___min._Dimmwert
Enumeration.Text: Off if dimming value < min. dimming value

Enumeration.Name: Ein-_und_Ausschalten_möglich
Enumeration.Text: Switching On and switching Off possible

Enumeration.Name: Ein_bei_Dimmwert___0____Aus_bei_Dimmwert___0_
Enumeration.Text: On if dimming value > 0% / Off if dimming value = 0%
